Container.Name: HDHomeRun-EPG2XML
Container.Overview: HDHomeRun EPG to XMLTV converter for Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby. Fetches EPG data directly from your HDHomeRun device and serves it via HTTP in standard XMLTV format. Features memory-efficient streaming, versioned EPG files, dummy programming for empty channels, and flexible query parameters for on-demand customization.
Container.Requires: HDHomeRun device on your local network

Config.Name: EPG Output
Config.Description: Directory to store EPG XML files

Config.Name: HDHomeRun Host
Config.Description: IP address of your HDHomeRun device (e.g., 192.168.1.100)

Config.Name: Cron Schedule
Config.Description: Update schedule in cron format (default: 3 AM daily)

Config.Name: EPG Days
Config.Description: Number of days of EPG data to fetch (1-14)

Config.Name: Run on Start
Config.Description: Fetch EPG immediately on container start

Config.Name: Enable Dummy Programming
Config.Description: Add placeholder programs for channels without EPG

Config.Name: Dummy Program Description
Config.Default: No program information is currently available for {channel}.
Config.Description: Description template for dummy programmes (use {channel} for channel name)
